value.name: Lawsuit: Supervisor negligence led to police shooting
value.description: News outlets report former Nashville police Officer Samuel Galluzzi ... the October 2018 confrontation with 31-year-old Sershawn Martez Dillon, who authorities said matched the description of ...

value.name: Police: Improper behavior may have led to police shooting
value.description: (AP) — Police in Nashville ... leading to 31-year-old Sershawn Martez Dillon fleeing and firing his weapon. Dillon was fatally shot in the back and Officer Samuel Galuzzi was wounded.
